Gian Luca Buoncompagni

Front End Specialist

I'm a web front end specialist and senior developer with more than 15 years of experience, focused on fast and responsive web sites and applications for desktop and mobile devices. As a team leader I managed and worked with remote and distributed international development teams.

Currently I'm Head of front end at Vivaticket in Milan, Italy.

Selected Previous Works

  • Il Fatto Quotidiano
    Redesign and front end development of main website and special editorial projects for web and mobile. Performance improvement and manteinance.

Previous projects for different web agencies include, among others, many international clients such as LAVAZZA (tablet and mobile version of 2014 calend, hybrid app for Android and Ios), FERRARI (Launch website for Formula 1 F138 singleseater), KINDER (entire international network of local corporate websites).

Personal Projects

  • Impicciato
    Hangman-like mobile game, built with react.js
  • Ai-translator
    AI proof of concept, based on Google's Cloud Vision and Translate APIs
  • Studio Pym
    Website for an editorial office in Milan, with custom CMS based on Wordpress
  • NanoScore
    Interactive mobile music score editor based on abc music notation

Skills

HTML5 & CSS3, javascript (ES6) and major front end libraries (ReactJs, VueJs). Extensive knowledge of cross-browser development and performance issues on different platforms and devices, mobile development, principles of UX design,usability and accessibility, information architecture, SEO practices and code optimization. Knowledge of server side languages and technologies (Nodejs, Express, Php and MySql).

Technologies

ReactJs, VueJs and major front end libraries. Rest APIs, css processors (SASS, postCSS), task runners, package managers and module bundlers (npm, gulp, webpack, babel), code versioning (GIT, GITFlow), unit and integration tests (Jest, Cypress), agile methodology (SCRUM, Kanban), CI/CD on mocroservices architecture.
